¤:cite(["13_stigma"]):¤ It appears that misconceptions about schizophrenia could be causing fear in others around you. Schizophrenia is often misunderstood, leading to a perception that individuals with the condition are unpredictable. It's important to remember that you are not defined by your illness—it is a part of you but not your identity. Changing this narrative involves understanding and sharing the true nature of schizophrenia, which is highly diverse and varies greatly in symptoms and severity.
